item.title: Proxies failing to balance
item.description:
Jul 13, 13:22 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 13, 13:14 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jul 13, 12:52 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue of our proxies failing to balance. We have reduced the maximum player count of the server during this issue.

item.title: SkyBlock Auction House, Bazaar, and Bank Disabled
item.description:
Jul 9, 09:46 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 9, 04:19 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Everything has been re-enabled and auction timers have been extended due to the down time.

Jul 9, 03:26 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 9, 00:51 EDT
Investigating - The Auction House, Bazaar, and Bank are currently disabled due to exploits, we are currently investigating the issues.

item.title: SkyBlock Auction House & Bazaar Disabled
item.description:
Jun 9, 17:53 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 8, 15:53 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 6, 12:43 EDT
Identified - The Auction House and Bazaar are currently disabled due to exploits, the issues have been identified and fixes are being implemented.
You can read more HERE.

item.title: Players unable to connect
item.description:
Jun 3, 15:17 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 3, 14:39 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 3, 12:21 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 3, 11:41 EDT
Update - We are currently investigating an issue where players are unable to connect to the Hypixel Minecraft Server.

Jun 3, 11:39 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where players are unable to connect to the Hypixel Minecraft Server.

item.title: SMP Servers not booting
item.description:
Jun 3, 15:17 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 3, 14:39 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 3, 12:21 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues with SMP servers being unable to start.

item.title: Unable to join games
item.description:
May 14, 19:04 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 14, 18:09 EDT
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for one of the database nodes that had a failure and are monitoring the results. We are slowly re-enabling disabled games and systems.

May 14, 17:31 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented. SkyBlock is currently in emergency maintenance while we work on implementing a fix.

May 14, 17:19 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue causing players unable to join some games and other issues on the Minecraft Server.

item.title: SkyBlock Update 0.13
item.description:
Apr 20, 17:51 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 20, 10:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 20, 08:43 EDT
Scheduled - SkyBlock will be undergoing maintenance for the release of 0.13.

item.title: Increased API response times
item.description:
Apr 9, 13:00 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 9, 12:34 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Apr 9, 11:05 EDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue of increased response times and bad gateway errors. The issue is currently isolated to SkyBlock profile endpoints.

Apr 9, 10:47 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with increased response times and some requests failing on the Public API.

item.title: Public API Outage
item.description:
Mar 28, 04:47 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 28, 04:45 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 28, 04:43 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Migration Verification Unavailable
item.description:
Mar 18, 21:06 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 18, 20:46 EDT
Monitoring - We have made some improvements to increase the available throughput of accounts using the service and are monitoring.

Mar 18, 20:31 EDT
Identified - We are aware of an issue that is preventing some players from verifying their migration status due to a high amount of players. We are working to improve this the best we can.

item.title: Players unable to join
item.description:
Mar 16, 11:08 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 16, 11:03 EDT
Monitoring - We are seeing players joining again and are monitoring

Mar 16, 10:30 EDT
Identified - We are aware of an issue with Mojang services causing players to be unable to join the server or play Minecraft. You can keep up to date with the issue on the MojangStatus Twitter

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

item.title: SkyBlock Auction House Maintenance
item.description:
Jan 27, 17:14 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 27, 16:57 EST
Verifying - Maintenance on the backend service should now be complete, we are monitoring and verifying the changes.

Jan 27, 16:00 EST
In progress - The SkyBlock Auction House is undergoing maintenance for updates to the backend service. During this time the auction house is unavailable, the Bazaar may also be unavailable for periods during this time. Auctions active during maintenance will have their duration extended for the duration of the maintenance.

Jan 27, 12:50 EST
Scheduled - The SkyBlock Auction House will be undergoing maintenance for updates to the backend service. During this time the auction house will be unavailable, the Bazaar may also be unavailable for periods during this time. Auctions active during maintenance will have their duration extended for the duration of the maintenance.

item.title: Players unable to join
item.description:
Jan 2, 23:09 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 2, 20:58 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 2, 20:29 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 2, 19:59 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where players are unable to join or have an increased latency to the server

item.title: Hypixel Forums unavaliable
item.description:
Jan 2, 20:21 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 2, 20:18 EST
Investigating - We are investigating an issue where the Hypixel Forums/Website is not accessible.

item.title: Players unable to connect and commands not working
item.description:
Dec 22, 13:43 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 21, 13:48 EST
Monitoring - We are monitoring the situation to see if the issue occurs again to get more data on the situation

Dec 21, 13:29 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Proxies not balancing
item.description:
Dec 20, 11:28 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 20, 11:25 EST
Monitoring - The issue has been resolved and we are increasing the player limit over the next several minutes.

Dec 20, 10:46 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified with an upstream provider, and we are working with them to resolve it as soon as possible. The server remains limited at a lower player count in the meantime.

Dec 20, 10:29 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where proxies are not balancing as expected, in the meantime, we have capped the server player count.

item.title: SMP servers not starting
item.description:
Dec 10, 15:38 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 10, 11:31 EST
Update - SMP is now open again and the issues should be resolved, we will be monitoring the results.

Dec 8, 09:34 EST
Update - Unfortunately repairing the issues with the database is taking much longer than expected and we are still working to restore SMP service. We will provide further updates when possible.

Dec 6, 22:31 EST
Update - We are continuing to work on the storage database to bring SMP back online as soon as possible. We are suspecting the process to still take some time but we are unable to provide an exact ETA.

Dec 6, 17:33 EST
Update - We are continuing to work on the storage database to bring SMP back online as soon as possible, thank you for your patience.

Dec 6, 11:15 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified with the storage database, we are currently working on a solution to bring SMP back as soon as possible. In the meantime, we have disabled starting and creating servers.

Dec 6, 11:10 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Network Connection Issues
item.description:
Dec 4, 20:23 EST
Resolved - Changes have been implemented to improve the issues that occurred on Wednesday.

Dec 1, 13:13 EST
Update - We are still continuing to implement a solution for the issues that occurred earlier today.

Dec 1, 10:17 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 1, 09:56 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with players and high latency and connection issues to the server.

item.title: Hypixel SMP Maintenance
item.description:
Nov 12, 09:00 EST
Completed - We have concluded our investigations and found the cause of some recent issues and SMP is now available as normal again.

Nov 12, 08:24 EST
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We have currently disabled the ability to join and start SMP servers.

Nov 12, 07:01 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 11, 16:30 EST
Scheduled - Hypixel SMP will be undergoing maintenance to further debug and track down recent issues with the backend service. During this time SMP may be completely unavailable.

item.title: SMP Server Booting and Command Unavailable
item.description:
Nov 11, 14:11 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 11, 13:59 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Nov 11, 13:58 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 11, 13:45 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where starting SMP servers is unavailable including the /smp command

item.title: Minecraft Server Authentication
item.description:
Oct 13, 05:41 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 13, 04:28 EDT
Monitoring - Issues were found with one of our upstream providers which now seem to be resolved and we are monitoring.

Oct 13, 03:57 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with some users being unable to join the Minecraft Server due to authentication issues.

item.title: Minecraft Server Issues
item.description:
Oct 12, 22:59 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 12, 22:00 EDT
Monitoring - A potential fix has been implemented and we are monitoring.

Oct 12, 21:39 EDT
Identified - A potential cause has been identified and we are working on a fix.

Oct 12, 20:56 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues with being unable to join the Minecraft server or perform actions at times
